qas.question: What gallery in Southampton houses a Designated Collection?
What's the all-lowercase named arts organization in charge of the art gallery in Southampton's Bargate?
What project, also run by a space, showcases art in Southampton's medieval buildings?
What art gallery is a part of Southampton Solent University?

context: There are many innovative art galleries in the city. <a0_0>The Southampton City Art Gallery<a0_0/> at the Civic Centre is one of the best known and as well as a nationally important Designated Collection, houses several permanent and travelling exhibitions. <a3_0>The Millais Gallery<a3_0/> at Southampton Solent University, the John Hansard Gallery at Southampton University as well as smaller galleries including the Art House in Above Bar Street provide a different view. The city's Bargate is also an art gallery run by the arts organisation "<a1_0>a space<a1_0/>". A space also run the <a2_0>Art Vaults<a2_0/> project, which creatively uses several of Southampton's medieval vaults, halls and cellars as venues for contemporary art installations.
